subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bears and Eagles Riverfront Stadium in Newark and Red Bull Arena in Harrison, N.J., are not far apart, but the sizes of their crowds — and perhaps their futures — are very different.
snippet: Bears and Eagles Riverfront Stadium in Newark and Red Bull Arena in Harrison, N.J., are not far apart, but the sizes of their crowds — and perhaps their futures — are very different.
